Row.Text: Some Units have the [icon:UNIT_CAUTION] [b]Pirate [/b]ability, such as Naval Units commanded by {LOC_LEADER_EDWARD_TEACH_NAME}. With Pirating, Units can attack other Naval Units that they are not at War with. Be on the lookout for [icon:UNIT_CAUTION] [b]Pirates[/b]: you may need to fight back.
